Integration

Data entry can be a time consuming task. Whether it is connecting Edda directly with email, or Crunchbase to pre-fill data, being integrated with external services is key to our business.

Category

External dataAutomationStorageEmailCalendar

  • Power your companies with quality external data.

    Crunchbase

    Crunchbase is the leading destination for cie insights.

    Learn more

    Newsfeed

    Get the latest news of your companies in Edda.

    Learn more

    Pitchbook

    PitchBook provides the best private market data.

    Learn more

  • Take advantage of the automation of tasks and focus on the essentials.

    Currencies

    Get a real-time calculations based on the E.C.B. exchange rate.

    Learn more

    Webform

    Get a custom webform for your website synced with Edda.

    Learn more

  • Synchronize your documents with your favorite services.

    Dropbox

    Dropbox is a modern space designed to reduce busywork.

    Learn more

  • Synchronize emails and documents with your favourite provider.

    Edda email

    Your emails automatically synced with Edda.

    Learn more

    Gmail plugin

    A powerfull plugin for your emails.

    Learn more

    Outlook addin

    A powerfull plugin for your emails.

    Learn more

  • Always keep an eye on your tasks.

    Tasks sync with calendar

    Sync your Edda tasks with your Calendar

    Learn more
